title: "If you're over 15 and like cartoons you're a loser."
body:
https://mobile.twitter.com/Cobratate/status/912702565242097664

"Specifically anime. South Park was funny. Simpsons is shit but popular whatever. Anime is for losers."

I find it hilarious that funimation popped up here too. Ben 10 Nguyen also seems like a pretty cool guy.



######the Chibi templar web news does not promote any views portrayed in this thread .
